content.question: The arrangement of phrases in lines 8-12 (“It changes . . . start again”) has the main effect of

choices.label: emphasizing the speaker’s frustration while trying to master the art of quiltwork
revealing that quilt makers are rarely satisfied with the finished result of their work
illustrating the complexity and nuance of the processes governing quiltwork
portraying quilt making as technically challenging yet somewhat monotonous

content.answer: illustrating the complexity and nuance of the processes governing quiltwork

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
